Text:
Hey.  Can you put this into a few more different type of archives?  You only have it in .zip and .rar, you can also put it in .ace, .7z, .arj and .zoo!!

Oh, and can you break it up into multiple 1kb files?  The 2mb zip files will not fit on my floppy disks.

...absolutely RIDICULOUS!!  Why do you people do things like this?  Is it just to piss people off?
